name: Shane Clark
text: This Pizza Hut is a solid 3 stars. The staff is generally friendly and the food is usually good. However, the places needs a total remodeling. Most of the mainstream fast food restaurants in Guntersville have been remodeled or upgraded in …More

name: William Poole
text: I called this pizza hut to have a pizza delivered to me but since I am not in a business or a home they would not believe to me even though I drive a truck and can give a good address. The girl on the phone accused me of yelling at her and …More

name: Mike B
text: Pizza was good, service was not. The waitress was also the delivery driver and we had to wait for her to make a delivery. She never came back and a man started helping us. We had to ask twice for a to go box and then had to walk up to get …More

name: Zerica Moss
text: The delivery wait time is RIDICULOUS & they could care less about how much of an inconvenience it is to get quoted a certain time but having to wait an ENTIRE HOUR after the estimated time that you’re given. And they don’t compensate at all for the inconvenience! Very unprofessional!!

text:

name: Rickey Bolding
text: Nice buffet with a nice price.

name: Lisa
text: I always stop in for the salad bar.

name: Stansell Gilbert
text: The nightshift person in charge was a lady named Tristan and they were amazing. The server's name was Malarie and she was friendly and courteous. The place was clean, the environment was friendly  and the Pizza and wings were above and beyond standard. I will go back.

name: Angels In heaven
text:
Walked in to pick up pizza and not one person customer was inside.
I now know why..our was pizza cold and the mushrooms looked like a day old.
The thin crust was burnt so bad, my cat would not eat it. …More

name: Vickie Thompson
text: The pizza here is it's good the service is good but of course as in any pizza restaurant if you want fresh pizza you will wait a little time for it to cook they don't pre make pizzas which is great. I go here and I get fresh pizza not pizza …More

name: Diane Gipson
text: Ordered pizza and wings at 5:45..got a text saying that my order was out for delivery.. it's now 6:35 and no delivery..I live 5 minutes away from Pizza Hut.. don't understand what takes so long

name: Sunscour Davis
text: Thin crust medium with half supreme and half green peppers and mushrooms. Served at our table, hot, fast and without the two halves mixing. (No sausage in my green peppers). Drinks were kept full and the place was clean.

name: Sandra Brown
text: Service was great food was not

name: B. Davis
text: They refused to deliver to a boat tied up at the Guntersville Harbor.  Wow!  I can't even count the number of pizzas I have ordered from Papa John's and had delivered to boat ramps while fishing near Scottsboro. …More

name: Rebecca Roberts
text: Salad bar was nasty. Lettuce old. Everything had been their for a long time. Very slow, unorganized service

name: Jamie Burks
text: Can't seem to get it right!  Ordered pizza tonight $25 when it arrives all the toppings are completely off one side of pizza and in box. (Literally 4 pieces had nothing but Alfredo on them)  Call to tell them and they we're so rude like …More

name: Matthew Hackney
text: Wonderful food and an amazing waitress.  She was always checking on us and making sure that everything was alright and that we had wnough to drink.  An absolute 10/10.
